trans-unit.source: References <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> objects stored at a different location when using XMLDSIG or XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Referanser <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"> </xref> objekter som er lagret på en annen plassering ved XMLDSIG eller XML-kryptering.

trans-unit.source: The KeyInfoRetrievalMethod class represents the `<RetrievalMethod>` element for both XML encryption and XML digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: KeyInfoRetrievalMethod klassen representerer den `<RetrievalMethod>` elementet til både XML-kryptering og XML-signaturer.

trans-unit.source: Use the KeyInfoRetrievalMethod class to reference the same <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> information in multiple XMLDSIG signatures or encrypted XML documents, especially when the referenced information is large.
trans-unit.target: Bruk KeyInfoRetrievalMethod klassen for å referere til samme <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>informasjonen i flere XMLDSIG signaturer eller krypterte XML-dokumenter, spesielt når den refererte informasjonen er stor.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>

trans-unit.source: For example, a `<RetrievalMethod>` subelement can be used to reference a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data> object that contains an X.509v3 certificate chain, which validates the signing key.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en `<RetrievalMethod>` delelement kan brukes til referanser for en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data>objekt som inneholder en X.509v3 sertifikatkjeden som validerer nøkkelen for signering.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<RetrievalMethod>` element, see Section 4.4.3 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om den `<RetrievalMethod>` elementet i avsnittet 4.4.3 XMLDSIG-spesifikasjonen, som er tilgjengelig fra World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) på www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, eller se spesifikasjonen XML-kryptering, som er tilgjengelig fra W3C på www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> class with the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) pointing to the referenced <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref> klassen med den angitte URI Uniform Resource Identifier () peker til den refererte <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the information to be referenced by the new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for informasjonen til refereres til av den nye forekomsten av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> class with the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) pointing to the referenced <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object and the URI that describes the type of data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref> klassen med den angitte URI Uniform Resource Identifier () peker til den refererte <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"> </xref> objekt og URIEN som beskriver data som skal hentes.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the information to be referenced by the new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for informasjonen til refereres til av den nye forekomsten av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The URI that describes the type of data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: URIEN som beskriver data som skal hentes.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer XML-representasjon av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object returned by this method is suitable for use as a subelement of an XMLDSIG or XML encryption `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>objektet som returneres av denne metoden passer for bruk som et delelement for en XMLDSIG eller XML-kryptering `<KeyInfo>` element.</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: XML-representasjon av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Parses the input <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> object to match.
trans-unit.target: Analyserer inndataene <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> objekt og konfigurerer den interne tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref> objektet samsvarer.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used to process a `<RetrievalMethod>` subelement of a `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis til å behandle en `<RetrievalMethod>` delelement for en `<KeyInfo>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: The XML element that specifies the state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: XML-element som angir status for den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the type of data to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et URI Uniform Resource Identifier () som beskriver datatypen som skal hentes.

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the type of data to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: En URI Uniform Resource Identifier () som beskriver datatypen som skal hentes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref> objektet.
